title: Multimodal Perception Technology-Integrated Language Learning Simulation for Strengthening Mathematical Job Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of fundamental mathematical terminology and workplace English expressions
context.additional_context: Performing math-related work scenarios (meeting report writing, data visualization presentations, etc.) in VR simulation environments, with real-time language feedback via recognition technology

learning_goals: Drafts of work reports can be written with 80% or higher accuracy using speech-to-text conversion technology in mathematical task scenarios.
The ability to analyze graphs/charts using image-to-text recognition technology and explain key data in English can be achieved.
The usage rate of appropriate formal terminology in work environments can be improved by 70% or more using location-based learning functions in VR-based simulations.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
